wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Francis Merrie (born 2 November 1998) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Tranmere Rovers.

He made his professional debut and played his first game for Wigan Athletic on 8 August 2017 in an EFL Cup first round tie against Blackpool, which ended as a 2–1 home victory for Latics. Lang came on in the 65th minute for Christopher Merrie.
